message: I’ve implemented the full DPO loss logic in `preference_loss`, computing the reference and policy score deltas, applying temperature scaling, logistic loss, and optional label smoothing, and returning per-example losses plus policy rewards. You should now run training to verify the loss behaves as expected. Let me know if any further tweaks are needed!
